TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EdgeMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 決定如何呈現非文字繪圖基本的邊緣。

span.span: Determines how the edges of non-text drawing primitives are rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文字物件一律會顯示使用反鋸齒功能，並不會影響設定邊緣模式值。Text objects are always displayed by using anti aliasing, and are not affected by setting the edge mode value. 預設值的非文字繪圖基本類型，例如和，是未指定。The default value for non-text drawing primitives, such as and , is Unspecified. 當您設定的視覺物件的邊緣模式值時，將所有子系繪圖基本的 visual 物件設定為相同值。When you set the edge mode value of a visual object, all the child drawing primitives of that visual object are set to the same value. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，以用於繪圖的基本類型，別名設定邊緣模式。The following example shows how to use the method to set the edge mode for a drawing primitive to Aliased. [!code-csharp[VisualSnippets#SetEdgeMode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/CSharp/Snippets.cs#setedgemode)] [!code-vb[VisualSnippets#SetEdgeMode](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/visualbasic/snippets.vb#setedgemode)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.EdgeMode Aliased = int32(1)

summary.span: 將非文字繪圖基本的邊緣呈現為鋸齒邊緣。

span.span: Render the edges of non-text drawing primitives as aliased edges.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.EdgeMode Unspecified = int32(0)

summary.span: 請不要變更非文字繪圖基本的目前邊緣模式。

span.span: Do not alter the current edge mode of non-text drawing primitives.
